001package io.cyborgcode.roa.db.config;
002
003import org.aeonbits.owner.ConfigCache;
004
005/**
006 * Holds the database configuration instance.
007 *
008 * <p>This class provides singleton-like access to the {@link DbConfig} instance,
009 * ensuring that the configuration is only initialized once using the OWNER library.
010 *
011 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
012 */
013public class DbConfigHolder {
014
015   private static DbConfig config;
016
017
018   private DbConfigHolder() {
019   }
020
021   /**
022    * Retrieves the database configuration.
023    *
024    * <p>If the configuration has not been initialized, it is created using the OWNER
025    * {@link ConfigCache}.
026    *
027    * @return The {@link DbConfig} instance.
028    */
029   public static DbConfig getDbConfig() {
030      if (config == null) {
031         config = ConfigCache.getOrCreate(DbConfig.class);
032      }
033      return config;
034   }
035
036}
